response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business or life, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate, making it an excellent opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
